title: Valentines day lol match maker
body: Match two league of legends characters together and say why you would want them to go out on valentines day

replies.body:
taric + ez

taric deserves a nice pretty girl. and it might quash the rumours about "taric is a fgt".

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rEHBIrzu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-14T03:02:33.756+0000)
>
> taric + ez
> 
> taric deserves a nice pretty girl. and it might quash the rumours about "taric is a fgt".

No I perfer Heartseeker Varus X Pink Taric.
trying to continue to "taric is gay" crap....im so sick of it. he is a manly man! not some namby pamby gayboy. match him with FEMALES! not half male half void goop wankers.

The "Taric is gay" crap is a problem, and there was nothing to warrant calling him gay. and it is born of homophobia. However, there is nothing saying he is straight. For all you know, he could have no sexual attractions, or he could be bisexual. But also, homosexual men can't be manly? Many gay men are manly.

And what's more manly than a manly man with another manly man?
This is why I am announcing BRAUM WITH TARIC, THE ULTIMATE IN MANLY LOL-SHIPPING! And to be honest, I think their personalities are quite compatible.
No one said he wasn't manly
